resources.string:
Thank you for choosing our SuperOxTodo app, a powerful memo software. We value user privacy and all data is stored locally on the device.
With our app, you can easily create tasks and organize them by priority. Once a task is completed, you can mark it as done and archive it in the Todo History module for future reference.
By long-pressing a task, you can conveniently edit its content or delete it, making your task management more flexible and efficient.
For your convenience, we also provide a quick add task feature. Simply click the button in the lower right corner of the screen to create a new task quickly.
We hope you will experience convenient and efficient task management while using our SuperOxTodo app!
